title: Why Amazon, Facebook, and Salesforce Stocks Fell Today

title: Here's How Much Market Value FAANG Stocks Lost in 2 Days
text: The massive tech stocks at the top of the market's food chain dropped $354 billion of market value in two days, erasing several days' worth of recent gains.

title: Facebook users will be paid to ditch their accounts for election study
text: Facebook users will be paid up to $120 to shut down their accounts as part of an experiment on how the platform affects elections. The social-media giant is reportedly recruiting users willing to give up Facebook and Instagram for one or six weeks in late September for a study of how the apps influence political.

title: Over 30 million people told Facebook if they had the coronavirus or wore masks — and now it will be used for science

title: This E-Commerce Push Has Massive Implications for Facebook Stock

title: Facebook Oversight Board member warns against excessive social media regulation
text: Helle Thorning-Schmidt, co-chair of Facebook's Oversight Board, warned that an aggressive regulatory approach could infringe freedom of speech.

title: 'We are above Facebook,' Oversight Board co-chair says
text: Helle Thorning-Schmidt, former prime minister of Denmark, says an independent Oversight Board at Facebook is a "step in the right direction.
